description:
It`s Christmas Eve. Normally around this time, people prepare to celebrate this sacred holiday. However, there`s one person in this world who won`t have a Merry Christmas, and that person is an poor, unlucky boy named Hayate Ayasaki, when his aloof parents get a debt worth 156,804,000 yen (approximately 1.3 million US dollars) and sell Hayate to the Japanese mafia to pay it off!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Unmei wa, Eigo de Iu to Destiny
運命は, 英語で言うとデスティニー
